parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the player's remaining time before respawn, or -1 if it is not available (such as when the player is alive).  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''playerRespawnTime''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[waitUntil]] {[[playerRespawnTime]] <= 0};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setPlayerRespawnTime]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 21, 2007 - 18:33 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Sy|Sy]]</dt>
<dd class="note">When playerRespawnTime reaches zero the player respawns as expected. When the player has completed respawning this command returns -1.
</dd>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on  February 25, 2009  - 18:33 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:RolanDecoy|RolanDecoy]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Also note that spawning doesn't create a body to use, but allows a player to choose an already
existing one as defined either in the mission editor or in a script as [[player]] or playable.
</dd>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>
